titles.title: A bill for the relief of Evelyn M. Rachoza.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 5/23/1988--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to pay a sum to be determined to a named individual in full settlement of all her claims under a National Service Life Insurance policy.
